title: One Piece: Skypiea Is the Arc You Either Love or Hate
author: CBR Staff
description: An article discussing the divisive nature of the Skypiea arc, noting how it's either considered a magnum opus or one of the worst arcs by fans. Highlights the arc's worldbuilding and unique narrative structure.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Skypiea arc

title: How Skypiea Became One Piece's Most Underappreciated Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: An article arguing that the Skypiea Arc's unique narrative continues to age like fine wine, giving it a legitimate claim as the most underrated arc in the entire series. Discusses how initial criticism has evolved over time.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the complete Skypiea arc

title: 8 Things The Skypiea Arc Added To One Piece's Story
author: CBR Staff
description: An analytical piece examining specific story contributions from the Skypiea arc, including worldbuilding elements, character development, and long-term plot setup.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses major story elements from throughout the Skypiea arc

title: 10 Best Episodes from One Piece's Sky Island Arc, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: A ranking of the best episodes from the Sky Island/Skypiea arc, analyzing key moments, animation quality, and narrative impact of standout episodes.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses key episodes throughout the entire Sky Island Saga

title: Episode 175 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 175 including plot summary, character appearances, technical credits, manga chapters adapted, trivia, and production information.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains detailed information about Episode 175 only

title: Ohm - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Ohm (Skybreeder), one of Enel's four priests, detailing his abilities, weapons (Eisen Whip), companion (Holy), battles, and role in the Skypiea arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains complete information about Ohm's role in Skypiea

title: Holy - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Holy, Ohm's giant martial artist dog companion, detailing his combat abilities, boxing techniques, and his critical weakness of being obedient to anyone's commands.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Holy's battles in Skypiea

title: Eisen Whip - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed page about Ohm's signature weapon, the Eisen Whip, explaining the Iron Cloud blade, Eisen Dial technology, and all named techniques (Eisen Back, Eisen Fan, Eisen Fork, Eisen Fleuret).

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Details all Eisen Whip techniques used in battles

title: Skypiea Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for the entire Skypiea arc, covering episodes 153-195, including plot summary, character introductions, major battles, and story significance.

title: Aisa - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Aisa, the young Shandian girl who was born with Observation Haki (Mantra), making her the youngest known character with this ability. Details her role in the Skypiea arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Aisa's role throughout Skypiea

title: Chapter 266 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 266 'Pirate Chopper vs. Priest Ohm', which along with Chapter 267 forms the source material for Episode 175. Includes plot summary and character appearances.

title: New to One Piece (Well Sort Of) - Discussion of Episode 175
author: Arlong Park Forums Users
description: Forum discussion where users note that Episode 175's title is misleading as Chopper and Ohm don't actually have an extended battle. Includes fan reactions to the episode.

title: Reading One Piece for the first time - Skypiea Saga Review
author: Book Cheshire Cat
description: A first-time reader's review of the Skypiea Saga, noting details like Ohm's sword being enhanced with dial tech and the blade made of cloud iron, making it malleable.

title: Sam's Piece: Skypiea Is the Best 'One Piece' Arc and There's Nothing You Can Do About It
author: Sam Quattro
description: Editorial piece defending the Skypiea arc as the best in One Piece, discussing its themes, worldbuilding, and long-term importance to the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the entire Skypiea arc in detail
